Package: ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.util

[Groovy] Class XmlFiles

    • ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.util.XmlFiles

    • A simple helper for reading / writing very simple, 1-level key/value holding xml files, as e.g. used by Android SDK's res/values/strings.xml files.

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          static java.util.List<CodeLine> read(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String attributeName)
          Parses the XML input and returns it as a List of CodeLines.
          static java.lang.String write(java.util.List<? extends CodeLine> codeLines, java.lang.String rootElement, java.lang.String elementName, java.lang.String attributeName)
          Converts the input List of CodeLines into their XML representation.

      • Method Detail

        • static java.util.List<CodeLine> read(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String attributeName)

          Parses the XML input and returns it as a List of CodeLines.

          Returns:
          the parsed input
          Parameters:
          input - the input provided
          attributeName - the name of the xml element node's attribute which holds the "key" information

        • static java.lang.String write(java.util.List<? extends CodeLine> codeLines, java.lang.String rootElement, java.lang.String elementName, java.lang.String attributeName)

          Converts the input List of CodeLines into their XML representation.

          Returns:
          the XML representation
          Parameters:
          codeLines - the code lines provided
          rootElement - the desired name of the xml root element
          elementName - the desired name of the xml element node
          attributeName - the desired name of the xml element node's attribute which holds the "key" information
